article: A 6-year-old girl asked her mother , " Can flowers speak ? " " Oh , my dearie , if flowers can't speak , how  _  the spring is , and who will look around it ? " The little girl smiled with  _  . At the age of 16 , the girl asked her father , " Can the stars in the sky speak ? " " Oh , my daughter , if the stars can speak , the sky will be noisy , and who will  _  for the peaceful heaven ? " The little girl smiled with satisfaction again . At the age of 26 , the girl had become a mature female . One day she asked in  _  her husband , a diplomat , " Was the way I  _  and spoke appropriate at the grand party last night ? " " Great ! " the diplomat had no  _  of flattering , " When you spoke , it was like the melodious music ; though you spoke so much , it was not  _  ; when you were silent , you were like a fragrant lotus flower ; though quiet , it involved everything ... Sweetheart , can you tell me how you  _  it ? " His wife said with a smile , " At the age of 6 , I learned from my mother as a teacher  _  to dialogue with nature . At the age of 16 , I learned from my father as a writer when to speak and when not . Before I  _  you , I learned from historians , philosophers , writers , musicians and diplomats what kind of speech I should  _  when I meet different kinds of people . Honey , I have also  _  thoughts , wisdom , courage and love from you ! "
